lines.text: Beatriz: My name is Beatriz, a scholar from Sevilla. Who are you?!
???: I am La Xana, the water fairy of Xibu lake and I protect the kind souls of this land.
Beatriz: Your voice felt enchanting, like all burdens were lifted from my mind. The people of Luarca are troubled with fear and could really use to hear your beautiful song.

La Xana: I wish to ease their fears, but the curse brought down on this land by El Cuelebre has weakened my magic. Near here grows a powerful herb called St. John wort, valued for its healing properties.
La Xana: If you could bring me 3 it will heal my magic so I can protect the people of Luarca. Do this for me and you will be rewarded.
